tool_description: An API that shows some small info about all countries in the world
name: minicountries
title: minicountries

api_list.name: nation
api_list.description:
This endpoint accepts a `GET` request.
It requires a name parameter. A valid example is `/nations/Kenya`
It returns a json object containing info about a nation.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://minicountries.p.rapidapi.com/nations/Kenya"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minicountries.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://minicountries.p.rapidapi.com/nations/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minicountries.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: nations
api_list.description: This endpoit returns the list of all countries. It accepts a `GET` method.
